Package me.mayhem.util

Class RGB

java.lang.Object
me.mayhem.util.RGB
public class RGB
extends java.lang.Object
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) for storing RGB (Red, Green Blue) colours and comparing them more easily

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier Constructor Description
    protected RGB​(int red, int green, int blue)
    Protected constructor as to only pass them through the static factory methods of(int, int, int) and from(int)
